description.raw:
This pull request adds stereo cameras to to the palm of each hand, with a 40 mm baseline. The pull request should be tested against [gazebo branch issue_camera_pose](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/compare/issue_camera_pose..default), which has a pull request pending.

The only issue right now is that the ros topic API for the cameras does not match that listed in the [DRC User Guide](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide#ROS_APIs). The user guide API uses l_hand and r_hand, while this pull request uses left_hand and right_hand instead. This was done because the xacro parameter ${side} contains either left or right, and I wasn't sure how to pull out the first character of that using xacro. Otherwise, we can make an additional parameter for specifying the ros topic, but this will require a coordinated change with drcsim.

The user guide API uses l_hand and r_hand, while this pull request uses left_hand and right_hand instead. This was done because the xacro parameter ${side} contains either left or right, and I wasn't sure how to pull out the first character of that using xacro. Otherwise, we can make an additional parameter for specifying the ros topic, but this will require a coordinated change with drcsim.
